news.news_1_subtitle: Use the native integration in Agents between bots and flows with our newly added channel.
news.news_2_subtitle: Use the native integration between Omnichannel Agents and Flows to easily complement human service.
news.news_3_subtitle: The date of the last message sent by the contact can be found on the contact's page, in Flows's detail section.
news.news_4_subtitle: New WhatsApp TextIt Channel to facilitate integration.
news.news_5_subtitle: Some bugs were corrected to improce performance Diversos bugs foram corrigidos e melhorias de performance feitas para melhorar a sua experiência.
news.news_6_subtitle: Use the version section on Artificial Inteligence to validate changes on your Artificial Inteligence without affecting the usersem afetar seus usuários.

account.profile_text: You can change your personal information, such as profile picture and username, or delete your account.
account.reset_confirm: Do you really wish to remove your profile picture? You can send another later.
account.delete_account_confirm: Do you really wish to delete your account? Any flows, intelligences and access to omnichannel will be lost and unrecoverable.
account.save_confirm: Do you wish to commit these changes?
account.password_confirm: Confirm this action entering your password
